scripts.generate-assets-orderly: tsc && vite build -c vite-orderly.config.ts --emptyOutDir --outDir ../../dist/orderly && npx pwa-asset-generator src/orderly/icons/pwa/logo-orderly.svg dist/alpha/assets -b '#5b3c88' -d true --icon-only true
scripts.generate-assets-proclaim: npx pwa-asset-generator src/proclaim/icons/pwa/logo-proclaim.svg src/proclaim/icons/pwa -b '#5b3c88' -f true -i src/proclaim/index.html && npx pwa-asset-generator src/proclaim/icons/pwa/logo-proclaim.svg src/proclaim/public/assets -b '#5b3c88' -d true --scrape false --icon-only true
scripts.build-orderly: tsc && vite build -c vite-orderly.config.ts  --emptyOutDir --outDir ../../dist/orderly && npx pwa-asset-generator src/orderly/icons/pwa/logo-orderly.svg dist/orderly/assets --scrape false --icon-only true
scripts.build-alpha-orderly: tsc && vite build -c vite-orderly.config.ts --emptyOutDir --outDir ../../dist/alpha && npx pwa-asset-generator src/orderly/icons/pwa/logo-orderly.svg dist/alpha/assets -b '#5b3c88' -d true --scrape false --icon-only true
